programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: Homemade Love Story tells the story of various people who gather at a house called Samgwang Villa, and how they start off as strangers but begin to open up their hearts and love one another.(n)

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe At Fun-Staurant
programme.desc: Six gourmets in Korea's entertainment industry team up to explore the world of convenience stores.(n)

programme.title: Entertainment Weekly
programme.desc: An entertaining weekly report on celebrities to satisfy your curiosity! Entertainment Weekly brings you a weekly wrap-up of news in the world of entertainment, as well as intimate interviews with stars to bring them closer to you.(n)

programme.title: Discovery Of Love
programme.desc: A woman has a conflict between her new love and old love. Han Yeoreum has started a new relationship with a perfect guy called Nam Hajin. However, her ex-boyfriend Kang Taeha returns while regretting his past. A story of a love triangle among these three young people.(n)

programme.title: KBS World News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.(n)

programme.title: We K-Pop Extra
programme.desc: K-Pop is enjoyed by people all around the globe. This is an in-depth variety show where K-Pop stars talk, perform and greet their fans. We K-Pop - of the fans, by the fans, for the fans. It is the global showcase for you, international fans!(n)

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King" Lee Gyenggyu who's also known for his love for dogs, along with the country's most famous dog expert Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how humans and pets live in peace and harmony.(n)

programme.title: DOCU INSIGHT

programme.desc: Embark on a two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all corners of Korea! The 2 Days and 1 Night cast travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of neighbours and beautiful nature.(n)

programme.title: Mr. House Husband
programme.desc: This reality show observes six men who do both housekeeping and parenting.(n)

programme.title: Studio K
programme.desc: Studio K is KBS' digital entertainment and music channel. Catch the most entertaining content right here!(n)

programme.title: One Night Only
programme.desc: Having lost all his fortune and loved ones from gambling, Gao Ye walks out from prison to an even crueler world. Intrigued by a beautiful hooker who approaches him for unknown reason, he comes up a master plan to redeem everything he once had, but things spin wildly out of control.(n)

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: A male boxer switches bodies with the female reporter who exposed his bribes. Now they must help each other win the championship.(n)

programme.title: The Last Thieves
programme.desc: Young entrepreneur Yin Tzu-hsiang and his partners dream to change the unreasonable structure of the current economy with blockchain. Yin meets Hsu Ching, realising that he has to change himself first.(n)
Many women feel turning 30 years old is a big step in their lives. The ageing issue not just affects them in feeling tired and experiencing loss of energy, but also drives them to feel sad.(n)

programme.title: The Rope Curse
programme.desc: Hoping to make a viral video by streaming a mysterious rope ritual, a couple falls into a deadly curse instead that turns their lives upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: A series of mysterious deaths and illnesses takes place in an apparently peaceful village. The victims are thought to be killed by poisonous wild mushrooms, but police officer Jong Goo hears from the mysterious Moo Myung that a Japanese man is involved in the deaths.(n)

programme.title: Shed Skin Papa
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man is tasked with taking care of his elderly father, only to discover that the man is shedding a layer of skin every day, making him younger in the process.(n)

programme.title: At Cafe 6
programme.desc: Miss Liang's car breaks down on a rainy night. A coffeeshop owner helps her and invites her to his shop called Cafe 6. Knowing that she had a fight with her long-distance boyfriend, he shares a story.(n)

programme.title: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: Only after an ambitious property agent, Charlie, joins a successful agency run by a rich couple does he realise the horrific secret behind the company's success. He is caught in an ethical dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Stained (Director's Cut)
programme.desc: Shek Jin's parents have gone missing, and the mass media has been conducting interviews about them.(n)

programme.title: What A Man Wants
programme.desc: A philandering cab driver makes a profound impression on his brother-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Yiu is sentenced to three years for manslaughter, while Ching was sent to prison for killing his wife over her being a prostitute. The inmates decide to go on hunger strike to protest against a cigarette price rise, and this causes problems with "Assassin".(n)

programme.title: Wayang Boy
programme.desc: The film follows 10-year-old Raja, an Indian boy who's recently been brought to Singapore by his stepmother Emma. After Raja gets into a scuffle with his new classmates Xavier and Shi Han, all three boys end up in detention.(n)

programme.title: House Of Fury
programme.desc: Teddy Yu appears to be just a Chinese chiropractor and widowed father. His son Nicky and daughter Natalie learn kung-fu from him, but the two kids are always skeptical of Teddy's claim of having a hidden life as a guardian for secret agents in the past. One day, Teddy gets kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: The Footprints
programme.desc: One night on the way home, Ka Wing has a car accident. Although his life is saved, he is seriously injured. Ka Wing is then told a very shocking news from his doctor.(n)

programme.title: Omotenashi
programme.desc: Jacky is the heir to a construction company in Taiwan. His father sends him to Kyoto to oversee the renovation of a hotel they had bought. Jacky goes to get back with his ex-girlfriend and to sell the hotel.(n)

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: Lam, a special agent of Japanese national security, teams up with JJ, a thief with a hidden agenda, to find a pair of plates used for the making of counterfeit US notes.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser
programme.desc: At the wedding of his former high-school crush Qiu Ya, unemployed musician Xia Luo is bitter about how successful his classmates have become and all that never was for him. The drunk Xia Luo hides in the bathroom and passes out. When he wakes up, he finds himself back in 1997 as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: Undercover policeman Wu teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a major drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.(n)

programme.title: The Bride
programme.desc: Han and Hao are about to get married soon when Hao picks up a strange red envelope on the street. Then, all hell breaks loose with a vengeful supernatural bride wreaking havoc on his life.(n)

programme.title: Lawyer Lawyer
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is Chan Mong Gut, an ace Chinese lawyer and merciless trickster who faces his biggest challenge when he has to leave China to defend a murderer in British-occupied Hong Kong! Making matters worse is the fact that the defendant is his former assistant Foon.(n)

programme.title: My Best Summer
programme.desc: Geng Geng had been an ordinary girl before her entry to the best high school in the province by chance. She doesn't like her life there until she meets Yu Huai, her seatmate - their names make up word 'Geng geng yu huai', meaning 'Unforgettable memories'.(n)

programme.title: The Road To Mandalay
programme.desc: A rundown truck barrels down the road, transporting its "illegal" human cargo under the cover of night. On board is Guo, a kind and honest young man who doesn't think of himself as an illegal immigrant.(n)

programme.title: Nina Wu
programme.desc: After eight years of scraping out a living performing in bit parts, Nina Wu has landed the lead role in a spy thriller set in the 60s. Under extreme pressure from the director, Nina starts to break.(n)

programme.title: The Gangs, The Oscars, And The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Director Wenxi and producer BS are two friends trying to make a zombie movie. With insufficient money, they join a local gang to make some extra cash. One day, their big boss Brother Long decides to invest in the movie project.(n)

programme.title: Triple Tap
programme.desc: Champion competitive marksman Ken comes across an armoured van robbery. He sees a policeman held hostage and shoots and kills four of the robbers. One of the robbers escapes. Soon after, Ken is attacked by the escaped robber Pang Tao.(n)

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: Han-Na is a very large girl with a warm heart. She also possesses an unbelievable voice. Han-Na wants to become a pop singer, but due to her extra-large appearance, she can only work as a faceless singer.(n)

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: After his attempted robbery runs aground, a thief takes a shine to his would-be victim - a charming prostitute who begins to tell him her life story.(n)

programme.title: Blood Of Youth
programme.desc: At a Yuancheng orphanage, teenage brawler Su Ang is beaten to within an inch of his life by bully Da Gui for standing up for his girlfriend Lin Qiao, a fellow orphan. Later, Lin Qiao takes revenge on Da Gui by luring him to a rickety water tower.(n)

programme.title: Detective Chinatown
programme.desc: This action-packed comedy follows Qin Feng and his second cousin, Tang Ren, Chinatown's top detective, as they investigate a bizarre murder in which they become the main suspects. They find the world against them with just seven days to solve the murder case.(n)

programme.title: The Viral Factor
programme.desc: International Security Affairs agent Jon is on a dangerous mission to escort a criminal scientist to another country. En route, a member of his team, Sean, turns out to be a traitor and shoots Jon in the head while kidnapping the scientist.(n)

programme.title: Long Long Time Ago
programme.desc: In 1965, pregnant Zhao Di is expelled by her husband's family and forced to return home. She gives birth to twins but due to familial pressure and superstition, she gives up one of them for adoption. Though life in the kampong is simple and hearty, it is also full of hardships and unexpected calamities.(n)

programme.title: The Wrath
programme.desc: In the household of Lee Gyeong-jin, a high-ranking official of Joseon Kingdom, three sons die from an unidentified horror. A woman pregnant with a child of the third son soon learns of the evil spirit that haunts the house.(n)

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: On a tour to Malaysia, a group of performers discover a cave occupied by the Japanese army during World War II. The performers are sprayed with a mysterious chemical that turns them into superhuman mutants.(n)

programme.title: David Loman 2
programme.desc: Comedian Zhu Ge Liang reprises his role as gang boss Loman who has since settled down to a more lawful life, running a guesthouse with wife Nana. However, things are no less peaceful with Loman welcoming gangsters into his guesthouse for free.(n)

programme.title: Shuttle Life
programme.desc: A poor family struggles to cope with tragedy and mental illness in a fractured society.(n)

programme.title: Cherry Returns
programme.desc: A traumatised young girl who was abducted 12 years ago is found alive. However, she carries out crimes on the orders of her abductor, and now the police must stop her before it's too late.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of The Cuckoo
programme.desc: After Kwan Ho marries and migrates to America, Man Cho continues with his life in Macau. He is a busy tour guide and has developed a close bond with his mute friend Kiki.(n)

programme.title: 49 Days
programme.desc: Medicine trader Shing Lau leads a team of eight, including himself, to venture from their homeland to the provincial capital. Unfortunately, a huge fire takes the lives of all his seven brothers.(n)

programme.title: Karma
programme.desc: In the basement car park, a car in which three people stay is bugged. Zhi Wei and Jia Jia monitor and listen. The innocent Jia Jia realises that things are much more serious than she thinks.(n)

programme.title: Shinjuku Incident
programme.desc: Tractor repairman Steelhead sneaks into Japan illegally to look for his girlfriend Xiu Xiu. He joins old friend Jie and a band of Chinese illegal immigrants living in the shadowy fringes of Japanese society. Steelhead rises to become the new leader of Shinjuku with the help of a yakuza boss.(n)

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: Ah Kum, the feisty woman we had seen in Golden Chicken, is now over 80 years old. She chances upon a young man attempting to erase his memory due to a bad breakup, and starts telling him her life story to stop him from doing something so foolish.(n)

programme.title: The Farewell Girls
programme.desc: Three girls have been chasing their music dreams, but they keep failing until they met the owner of a funeral service company. They perform with a pair of funeral singers, but they do not get along well.(n)

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: Choi Ik-Ho is a martial arts star. Ace is a game planner who makes a game for the Korean upper class. He is a villain who turns the city into a big gameboard through technology. Ace and Choi Ik-Ho become adversaries as Choi Ik-Ho jumps into the game to save his brother.(n)

programme.title: Ace Of Sales
programme.desc: Sue takes on a sales job at a hypermarket. Her terrible promoting skill gains her atrocious sales and mocking from her senior, Mei. Fortunately, she meets a triad boss, Jack, who teaches her a sales technique that eventually transforms her.(n)

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Powerful Chief Inspector Lak and his cohorts have practically turned half of Hong Kong into their corruption empire. This prompts the Hong Kong Governor to set up an anti-corruption arm to fight them.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends do something bad and run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: Triangle
programme.desc: Small-timer Fei, his married buddy Sam and antique store owner Mok are all in desperate need of money. Fei wants his friend to drive a robbery getaway car but Sam backs out, throwing Fei in trouble with the triads.(n)

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: While two criminals hide out at a woman's apartment after a botched robbery, an ex-cop tries to find a missing gun.(n)

programme.title: Who Am I
programme.desc: Finding himself at a murder scene, bike courier Li Ziwei tries to escape, but the culprits force him off a bridge. The amnesia from his head injuries means he can't recognise the faces of his enemies, who have framed him for the crime.(n)

programme.title: Take Me Home
programme.desc: After losing his memory from an accident, Tan tries to find his identity. The more he knows his so-called family, the more he learns to fear of their secrets.(n)

programme.title: The Truth About Jane & Sam
programme.desc: Sam, a Singapore guy who works in Hong Kong, falls in love with and opens up the wary character of Jane, a Hong Kong girl.(n)

programme.title: The Banquet
programme.desc: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, which is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.(n)

programme.title: Lost On Journey
programme.desc: A boss of a toy corporation, Chenggong Li, tries to head back to Chan Sar to celebrate the Chinese New Year with his family. However, plans don't go smoothly after he crosses paths with a stranger, Geng Niu.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Zhu's Summer
programme.desc: Mr Zhu teaches in an elementary school. He is not very smart, but always tries to maintain his integrity. His care and affection for students is not appreciated by all.(n)

programme.title: Exodus
programme.desc: One afternoon, Tsim is on duty in the police station's report room. Kwan Ping Man, a suspect accused of peeping in a women's washroom, is giving a statement. Kwan denies the charge but tells Tsim the big secret he overheard in the washroom.(n)

programme.title: Long Long Time Ago 2
programme.desc: Zhao Di takes over her family farm with the help of Ah Long after the 1969 floods. After the government starts reclaiming land for development in 1977, owners like Zhao Di are compensated, but her brother accuses her of having an affair with Ah Long to get the money for himself.(n)

programme.title: Suddenly Twenty
programme.desc: Parn is a stubborn old woman in her 70s whose only pleasure in life is to brag about her son who she single-handedly raised to be a professor. One day, she learns that her son is planning to send her off to a nursing home.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Duet
programme.desc: The story of rich kid Lee Mong Fong being entangled in a driving penalty points scandal becomes an overnight sensation in Hong Kong. The incident's only witness, Meng Tzi Leung, refuses to cooperate with the police. Detective Lau Mong Long goes undercover to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Edith returns the abandoned items from Anita Mui's house to its original senders after the death of the famous Cantopop diva in 2003. The film revives five close fans' collective image and memory of Mui.(n)

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: Two mountain road racers, Nakazato and Takahashi, challenge each other to find the best racers. Nakazato is surprisingly defeated by an old Toyota Trueno AE86 one night, but the car that beat him was actually driven by a local tofu shop owner's son, Takumi.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Era
programme.desc: This film tells the life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.(n)

programme.title: Buddies In India
programme.desc: In an effort to save his house, a man accompanies the son of a recently-deceased CEO to India to recover his will.(n)

programme.title: The Unity Of Heroes
programme.desc: This film tells the story of master Huang Feihong's calm and sagacious characteristics, and the double worries of the provocation of Beiquan and the invasion of foreigners.(n)

programme.title: We Are Family
programme.desc: Finishing college can be scary and confusing. And for three irresponsible and particularly confused boys, college just got a lot more complicated. One day, their old friend Kaka unexpectedly returns home after studying abroad and brings with her an unexpected delivery: a baby!(n)

programme.title: Twa-Tiu-Tiann
programme.desc: Through a painting, a college boy unexpectedly travels 100 years back in time to the 1920s, when Taiwan was under Japanese rule.(n)

programme.title: The Stool Pigeon
programme.desc: Police Detective Don Lee makes a bad call, causing a close informant to be injured. A year later, he must find a new man to go undercover inside a jewel-theft ring. Ghost Jr. doesn't want to do it, but Lee can offer deals and apply pressure that makes it hard to say no.(n)

programme.title: Meet Miss Anxiety
programme.desc: Often violent and almost always rowdy, the perpetually drunk Qi Jia seems to stumble from one messy situation to another. She shares an apartment with her best friend Shuer and the shy Xiaoou whose apparent affections for Qi Jia go sadly unnoticed.(n)

programme.title: Mothers
programme.desc: Hyo Jin is a 32-year-old woman. Two years ago, her husband died in an accident. Her husband has a 16-year-old son, Jong Wook, from a previous marriage. Hyo Jin begins to live with Jong Wook.(n)

programme.title: All Because Of Love
programme.desc: Erkan, a frequent victim of bullies in high school, wants to reveal his affection for the beautiful Man-li. When Erkan confesses his love for Man-li, her current boyfriend Andy gives Erkan a good beating!(n)

programme.title: Love In A Puff
programme.desc: Pang Ho-Cheung's Love In A Puff skewers the foibles of contemporary courtships with unerring accuracy, adroitly capturing the restless, kooky and very human side of Hong Kong's dating culture.(n)

programme.title: House Of The Disappeared
programme.desc: Twenty-five years ago, Mi-Hee was an ordinary housewife who was married to Chul-Joong with a son. Suddenly, her husband died and her son went missing. This all took place at their house.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Men
programme.desc: Shi Shen is the top performer in the Tiger Crane Lion Dance Association, but feels restricted by Master He's traditional mindset. He decides to take in a group of disciples and forms his own lion dance troupe, which fuses hip-hop and rock with lion dance movements.(n)

programme.title: Packages From Daddy
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Lan lives a peaceful and happy life with his parents and sister in a seaside town. His father suddenly passes away, and time stops for this family engulfed in grief. One day, Lan receives a mysterious package sent by his father before his death.(n)

programme.title: Love The Way You Are
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel "Peking University Students", this film tells the story of sweet and sour love among Xue Lin, Zhou Lin Lin and Fang Yu Ke, the student of the next home.(n)

programme.title: The Unmatchable Match
programme.desc: Ruthless gangster Shing Fui-On pulls off a daring and violent heist of diamonds. He then enlists the aid of longtime triad member Chan Wai-Man to arrange a buyer for them.(n)

programme.title: Chocolate Inspector
programme.desc: Inspector Chocolate has served the Special Crime Squad for a long time, but lacks achievement. One day, Superintendent Chao assigns his daughter Anita to Chocolate's team for a mysterious missing child case.(n)

programme.title: Magnificent Warriors
programme.desc: Aviatrix Michelle Yeoh is a female Indiana Jones in an adventure that pits her and agent Derek Yee against the Japanese in 1938.(n)

programme.title: From Riches To Rags
programme.desc: Ricky and Fatso become millionaires overnight after buying a winning lottery ticket. During one of their swinging nights in town, Ricky is suddenly attacked by an upset stomach; in no time, a quack doctor diagnoses the seizure as terminal cancer.(n)

programme.title: Master Q
programme.desc: Comic book characters Master Q and Potato meet Nicholas Tse and Cecilia Cheung in a dazzling mixture of animation and live action.(n)

programme.title: 100 Ways To Murder Your Wife
programme.desc: Two men plot to kill their beautiful but nagging and unbearable wives.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as Dragon, a rebellious young man who is always getting into trouble along with his best friend, Cowboy. The friends meet Tiger, a man in hiding from the Chinese Imperial Guardsmen who conspired with him to steal a number of priceless artifacts from the Forbidden City.(n)

programme.title: Forever Young
programme.desc: While on a Thai sex tour, Eric Tsang's pals drink a potion that turns them into kids. Can Eric steer them back to adulthood?(n)

programme.title: Dream Of Desire
programme.desc: Dream of Desire revolves around the complicated love affairs among two guys and three girls.(n)

programme.title: Faces Of Horror
programme.desc: Four youngsters return to the house that claimed their friend's life to confront the demon. A single mother and her daughter live with a curse and a wandering ghost searching for her living lover.(n)

programme.title: Love Unto Wastes
programme.desc: Chow is assigned to investigate a murder case. He discovers the complicated relationship among four suspects.(n)

programme.title: Dreams Of Glory, A Boxer's Story
programme.desc: Two up-and-coming young fighters struggle to reach the top of their sport and survive the difficulties of life outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: No Compromise
programme.desc: Tackling serious crime is Danny Lee's routine job, and his wife DoDo Cheng always worries about his safety. Cheng forces Lee to choose between abandonment of job and divorce. On the other hand, Lee racks his brains over pursuing the robbery couple, Lam Wai and Pauline Wong.(n)

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: A frozen Ming Dynasty royal guard and the equally frigid rapist-killer he's tracking are thawed out in modern-day Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Master Q
programme.desc: Comic book characters Master Q and Potato meet Nicholas Tse and Cecilia Cheung in a dazzling mixture of animation and live action.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: It's wacky family shenanigans with gynecologist dad Richard Ng, lawyer mom Bobo Fung and kids Lui Fong, May Lo and Pauline Kwan.(n)

programme.title: Peacock King
programme.desc: Tibetan monk Yuen Biao goes to Tokyo to save the world from the King of Hell and his virgin daughter Ashura.(n)

programme.title: The Wesley's Mysterious File
programme.desc: Wesley, a special agent working in a secret UN department investigating extra-terrestrial sightings, is hot on the trails of a beautiful alien in town looking for her brother.(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Cop Shop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police station used to be a clubhouse of the Japanese during World War II. In the present time, after thief Sneaky Ming is captured and incarcerated at the station, he is lured into a world of the paranormal by the spirits of those still inhabiting the building.(n)

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: A fishery seeks court action against a local chemical factory for polluting the water. The mysterious chemical company hires lawyer Jackie Lung to find information that will discredit the fishery. He employs his friend Wong to woo the fishery owner, Miss Yip, to convince her to settle out of court.(n)

programme.title: Will Of Iron
programme.desc: Maggie returns to Hong Kong to accompany her grandmother to Canada. She takes the opportunity to visit her old friends Carol and Jacky. Little does she know that Jacky has become a drug addict. More surprisingly, the drug dealer is Maggie's boyfriend, Michael.(n)

programme.title: Fantasy Romance
programme.desc: Leung Chiu Wei and Willy are cartoonists. One day on the way to office, they knock down a lady ghost, Joey Wong. Joey's spirit is thus thrown into the human world.(n)

programme.title: The Spy Dad
programme.desc: Jimmie Bond is a famous comedy actor who specialises in playing the role of heros like James Bond, but he is as timid as a mouse in real life. His cowardice causes his wife Mandy to divorce him, leaving him to take care of his two lovely daughters, Cream and Crispy.(n)

programme.title: Police Story II
programme.desc: Due to detective Chan Ka Kui's unorthodox police work on the last case, he has been demoted to traffic duty, but the vengeful mobsters still have their sights on taking him down. However when terrorists threaten Hong Kong, Chan must track down the suspects.(n)

programme.title: Lady In Black
programme.desc: Kin Seng has a goal to be in the upper class of society, but he falls into big debts in the gambling house. So he persuades his loving wife, May, to embezzle a huge sum from work to save him. In order to repay the sum, they go to Thailand to seek help from Kin Seng's uncle but in vain.(n)

programme.title: 100 Ways To Murder Your Wife
programme.desc: Two men plot to kill their beautiful but nagging and unbearable wives.(n)

programme.title: Banana Cop
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates a London Chinatown crime with the help of prisoner Teddy Robin and blind teacher Cherie Chung.(n)

programme.title: Why Me
programme.desc: Fat Cat is an intellectually-disabled man who endures the mistreatment of the local villagers. Koko, an idealistic social worker, tries to give Fat Cat a better life. Her battle against apathy on his behalf takes its toll on them both.(n)

programme.title: Oh My Cops
programme.desc: Buddy cops Porky and Big Mouth are promoted to the anti-prostitution division after solving a robbery case. To crack down on a prostitution ring, the bumbling duo arrange for Margaret to go undercover.(n)

programme.title: Mr Boo Meets Pom Pom
programme.desc: Mr. Boo is a mastermind in the forensic department of the Royal Hong Kong Police Force. Despite his tremendous success in his work, he on at the verge of losing his beautiful and young wife to a handsome billionaire, Yang.(n)

programme.title: Cop Busters
programme.desc: Big Bear and Big Mouth were raised in the same orphanage. They were assigned to tow cars by their division commander, but on the first day of their assignment they mistakenly pick up a little girl.(n)

programme.title: Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Policeman Lau wants to avenge his partner's death, and tracks down eyewitness Fat Goose.(n)

programme.title: Love Is Love
programme.desc: Shi Jinshui and Wu Daidi are childhood sweethearts. They elope from their hometown and live in the urban city, where Jinshui falls in love with his superior and breaks up with his wife Daidi. Later, Jinshui finds himself still in love with Daidi and decides to find his beloved wife.(n)

programme.title: My Cousin The Ghost
programme.desc: Kenny's cousin Richard is coming to Hong Kong to search for a bride, but he is killed in an accident on his way.(n)

programme.title: The Big Boss
programme.desc: A young student (Bruce Lee) honours the vow made to his master that he will not use his deadly hands to harm others. The fighter does his best and goes to work at a seemingly peaceful ice factory. Unfortunately, he must break his promise after his master is murdered.(n)

programme.title: Read Lips
programme.desc: Countless hours spent enunciating dialogue over Hong Kong movie productions come in handy when a professional dubber reads a dastardly scheme on the soundless lips of a bad guy and resolves to put a stop to things.(n)

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia
programme.desc: Thirty-two-year-old Leung Foon has been married for seven years, but looking back at his marital life, Foon and his wife Ann seem to only have endless conflict. Deciding to live a life being a true man, Foon separates from Ann.(n)

programme.title: The Happy Ghost
programme.desc: A group of girls go on a camping trip and take shelter from the rain in an abandoned temple. One of them, Bonnie, takes a rope she found in the temple back with her not knowing that in the rope lies the soul of a fallen scholar from the Ching Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: The Other Side Of Gentleman
programme.desc: Alan Tam falls for Brigitte Lin, not knowing she's merely using him for a psychological experiment conducted by her fiance.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Tin Yat promises Siu Ling to give her free tools for catching ghosts. Meanwhile, Shengmu comes to Yat for fortune telling. According to the prophecy, Shengmu will fight Fuxi, which will eventually lead to an apocalypse.(n)

programme.title: Games Gamblers Play
programme.desc: Petty conmen Michael and Sam Hui try every scheme imaginable to make a fortune through gambling, with hilarious results.(n)

programme.title: City On Fire
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewellery store.(n)

programme.title: Sentenced To Hang
programme.desc: A powerful drama based on the infamous Three Wolves Case of 1963, with Tony Leung the youngest member of a murderous trio.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: A star-studded comedy about an odd couple. The man is a kind-hearted small-time thief, while the woman is an imperious prison officer.(n)

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Yiu is sentenced to three years for manslaughter, while Ching was sent to prison for killing his wife over her being a prostitute. The inmates decide to go on hunger strike to protest against a cigarette price rise, and this causes problems with "Assassin".(n)

programme.title: She Shoots Straight
programme.desc: Policewoman Mina Kao and her supervisor Huang Tsung-pao experience the complications of a workplace romance and marriage.(n)

programme.title: Beyond's Diary
programme.desc: Legendary Hong Kong band Beyond star in the 1991 feature film Beyond's Diary. In the tradition of the Beatles and Wynners films, this is a story of youth and music told with the genre mishmash and plucky energy of 90s Hong Kong cinema.(n)

programme.title: Happy Din Don
programme.desc: A guitarist disguises himself as a woman and joins a girls' band on a tour to Thailand. He falls for the leading singer during the trip.(n)

programme.title: Armour Of God II
programme.desc: Jackie Chan returns as grave robber Asian Hawk, who's contracted to find a hidden cache of Nazi gold. His journey leads him to various exotic locales and companionship with not one, but three comely females of differing origin.(n)

programme.title: Dream Of Desire
programme.desc: Dream of Desire revolves around the complicated love affairs among two guys and three girls.(n)

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Uncle Tak, an old martial arts master, has severe problems with his former student Jonny, who wants nothing more than to kill his old master to show everyone who the real master is. Uncle Tak wants Jet, his best student, to come over from China to the US.(n)

programme.title: Born To Gamble
programme.desc: Nat Chan is a gambler who gives it all up for his anti-gambling fiancee Joyce Godenzi, but her gambling dad has other ideas.(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty 5 - Middle Man
programme.desc: Super cop Cynthia Khan and US Navy sailor David Wu fight global spies in Part 5 of this popular gals-with-guns movie series.(n)

programme.title: Play Catch
programme.desc: Alan Tam is mistaken by snakehead Eric Tsang as a rich kid and is kidnapped. Reporter Olivia Cheng comes to his rescue.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: The police demand an early graduation for the SDU squad. Tin Ngai works as a bartender in Waiting Bar. Officer Chan brings everyone to the hotel for a mission. In the meantime, he has a secret task for Mars.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Pickpocket
programme.desc: Pickpocket Sammo Hung falls for policewoman Deanie Yip and is convinced to steal for her. But Deanie is not what she seems to be.(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Friends
programme.desc: In order to save her father's television station, Elizabeth asks four funny witty guys for help, but the situation gets worse under their guide.(n)

programme.title: You Bet Your Life
programme.desc: Gambling-obsessed couple Mr and Mrs Luo, after hearing that a rival called Snake's recent run of luck has been due to his taking of "coffin air", decide to follow him one night, ending up in a run-down mortuary.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Town Story
programme.desc: The story begins on the wedding day of Lanjuan, whose marriage is put on hold when gunmen kill her entire family.(n)

programme.title: Zodiac Killers
programme.desc: Three young Chinese - Ben, Ming and Chuck - come to Japan for study and adventure. Ming wants to make it big fast. So he marries Yuriko, sister of underworld godfather Ishikawa.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye My Love
programme.desc: Through a blood test, Lindy knows that she is been suffering from blood cancer. Lindy decides to move in a new flat where there occupies a notorious man who is a hot-tempered crook.(n)

programme.title: Picture Of A Nymph
programme.desc: An atmospheric tale of ghost Joey Wang who hides in a portrait to evade an evil demon, with warrior Yuen Biao coming to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Lord
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as Dragon, a rebellious young man who is always getting into trouble along with his best friend, Cowboy. The friends meet Tiger, a man in hiding from the Chinese Imperial Guardsmen who conspired with him to steal a number of priceless artifacts from the Forbidden City.(n)

programme.title: Queen Of Underworld
programme.desc: Har Jay was a mere waitress when she became romantically involved with a handsome young customer, but her life gets endlessly complicated when the selfish lover gets her pregnant and then refuses to help care for the baby.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Scoundrels
programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: What A Small World
programme.desc: Unhappy couple Rosamund Kwan and Lawrence Ng go separately to Paris and London and rekindle friendships with Ray Lui and Nina Li.(n)

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: The film follows the exploits of Dr. Yang, a kind physician who spends his days tending to the sick, but leaves his evenings open to right wrongs in the guise of the shadowy Iron Monkey. The beautiful Orchid assists the hero in both his identities.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Dragon
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays a naive young kung-fu student who leaves his rural home on a small island to find his fortune in Hong Kong under the dubious guidance of his uncle, who cons him into using his natural skills as a snooker player for financial gain.(n)

programme.title: Bullet In The Head
programme.desc: A John Woo classic set in Saigon and Hong Kong in 1967, about an epic test of love and loyalty between Tony Leung and Jacky Cheung.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: The SDU squad except for Siu Ling turns out after receiving a call for help. The squad arrives at the hotel, only to find the staff killing one another. Following Officer Chan's order, Mars finds a music box in the room.(n)

programme.title: The Intellectual Trio
programme.desc: Wong Kar-wai co-scripted this comedy about cops Leslie Cheung and Billy Lau who encounter pickpockets Sandy Lam and Joyce Ngai.(n)

programme.title: Tian Di
programme.desc: Set in the 1920s, the film tells the story of Cantonese native Cheung Yat-pang who recently returned from France to Nanjing after further studies and is appointed by the government to be the first Commissioner of the opium trade ban.(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of cops get brutally exposed to violence after raiding a drug operation and discovering a link between a few members of the police force and an American crime syndicate dealing with drug trafficking.(n)

programme.title: Pom Pom
programme.desc: Ah Chau and Beethoven are a pair of cops investigating a drug lord, but their ineptitude threatens to derail the case.(n)

programme.title: Spooky Encounters
programme.desc: Villager Bold Cheung, known for his willingness to do anything courageous or daring, becomes a target by the evil rich Master Tam who wants to keep Cheung's wife as his mistress. Cheung is tricked into a bet to spend the night in a haunted temple.(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor's Swan Song
